kpi.name: M1006C191

kpi_info.title: RRC RE-ESTABLISH FAIL NO REPLY MULTI RAB
kpi_info.use: The number of failed RRC connection re-establishments due to the UE not replying to an RRC: CELL UPDATE CONFIRM message sent by the RNC, for UEs with at least two RABs. UPDATED: When the RNC does not receive a reply to an RRC: CELL UPDATE CONFIRM message initiated with the CELL UPDATE procedure with the cause "Radio link failure" and the UE has got at least two RABs.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC RE-ESTABLISH FAIL NO REPLY MULTI RAB
